::Zardus::

Zardus dodges one of Kamodia's shots, smiling. He couldn't belive she thought 
that she could actually defeat him! The smile disapears from his face as he 
sees the other rocket heading for him.

Zardus raises an arm to shield his face, flying sideways, but a bit too late. 
The rocket grazes his arm, exploding. Zardus is blown the oposite direction, 
his jetpack coming back on to stop him from slamming into a tree. He growls. 
Apart from being charred, there was no major damage as far as his systems 
could detect.

He sets his jetpack on full power, flying toward Kamodia and deactivating it 
a bit off the ground, falling the rest of the way. He lands perfectly, 
rolling to his feet near Kamodia and taking out his sword in one fluid 
motion. He slashes the sword at Kamodia.
